name: de:branding
author: deco.agency

sections.description:
You can quickly setup site skin advertising within the de:branding.

In an admin panel, you can upload an image and switch some settings. There are on the option to add a margin in the top of the website so that advertising will be shown not only on both sides of content.

We have next options in an admin panel:
– width; name for you wrapper class
– color and image for the background
– background positioning, alignment, size
– link for background

On top of all that, de:branding can be effortlessly integrated into any WordPress website.

Help us with the translation to your language, and we will feature you here
sections.changelog:
1.0.3

2 more background sizes cover & contain were added

1.0.2

Some changes to the plugin settings page

1.0.1

Added a required field for wrapper class name (in case you check a box “Use wrapper class”)

1.0.0

  • Initial release.
